title: Water in Bogor
creator_credit: Brian Hannant, John Morris and Film Australia
brief_description: Bogor, a large bustling city one hour’s drive from Jakarta, is one of the highest rainfall areas on earth. This film records the progress of one of the projects in the program of Australia’s aid to Indonesia: providing Bogor with a clean water supply.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Hannant, John Morris and Film Australia
